name: Impostor Simulator DEMO
description:
AMONG US FUNNY!!!!

--------------------------------

Arrow Keys or A and D - Walk

E - Stab (Move near crewmate)

R - Vent (Move near crewmate)

T - Tongue (Reaches across map)

F - Mask (Makes crewmate not run away)

G - DEFEAT  (Change map and make the Crewmate rapidly take damage for 10 seconds)

Up and Down Arrow Keys - Volume

CLOSE WINDOW AND REOPEN TO PLAY AGAIN
